body:
OK, duh.  I should have realized.  Just go to the first "switch"
statement in the falsecolor script.  (It's a text file, so you can
edit it.)  Add the following to the list of cases:

case -spec:
set redv='1.6*v-.6'
set grnv='if(v-.375,1.6-1.6*v,8/3*v)'
set bluv='1-8/3*v'
breaksw

You can stick it in anywhere before the "default:" case.

-Greg
subject: [Radiance-general]OSX ra_tiff "-spec" option
